song_lyrics: Soraṭhmā ugyu, kalpavṛukṣhnu re rūḍu zāḍavu,
Ḍāḷiyun pogī kachchha ane gujarāt re... °ṭek
E ja maḷe emā kāī nahī ferfār re... Soraṭh° 1
Faḷanī veḷā bahu paḍe chhe fer re... Soraṭh° 2
Koī māge dūdh ne koī māge dikarā,
Koī to māge kuhāḍāthī mot re.. Soraṭh° 3
Duṣhkṛutiyune chhāyaḍe lāge ṭāḍh re... Soraṭh° 4
Haiyu sonpyu sant Jogīne hāth re... Soraṭh° 5
title: Soraṭhmā ugyu kalpavṛukṣhnu re rūḍu zāḍvu

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-972: Kaag Bapu

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad
